category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 6 (Enactment, revision and abolition of regulations)
contents: Article 6 (Enactment, revision and abolition of regulations) ① When the Corporation wishes to enact or change regulations for the efficient performance of business, it must obtain a resolution from the Board of Directors. However, regulations regarding organization, personnel, compensation, accounting, assets, auditing, management and operation of funds, etc. must be approved by the Minister of Health and Welfare. Revised 2009. 6. 23., 2010. 3. 30., 2022. 1. 5., ② Matters delegated in Paragraph 1 and matters necessary for enforcement of the regulations shall be determined by the Chairman., [Title changed 2022 1. 5.]
